SYDNEY RILUM is a first-year master’s student at the UCSB Bren School of Environmental Science & Management, and plans to pursue a dual specialization in Coastal Marine Resources Management and Coastal Planning. She graduated magna cum laude from the University of San Diego in 2018 with a bachelor’s in Environmental & Ocean Sciences, Marine Ecology focus. Sydney hopes to further her career in ocean conservation, education, and research with a specific focus on the impacts of climate change and plastic pollution.
